movie.title: The Phantom Tollbooth
movie.director: Chuck Jones, Abe Levitow, Dave Monahan
movie.writer: Chuck Jones (screenplay), Sam Rosen (screenplay), Norton Juster (based on the book by)
movie.actors: Butch Patrick, Mel Blanc, Daws Butler, Candy Candido
movie.plot: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.
